alert.note: Alert for Arthur (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Arthur County through 1145 PM MDT... At 1044 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Arthur, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arthur, Swan Lake, Haythorn Lake, Jensen Lake, Bucktail Lake, Lena, Sand Puddin Lake, Three Mile Lake and Velma. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 116 and 133. Highway 92 between mile markers 165 and 177. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM MDT for west central Nebraska.
